name: Howie Go Viral
storyline: Howie is trying to avoid you. He is a germaphobe. But you can lure him in. Got hand sanitizer? A face mask? Hazmat suit? Unlock the Howie Mandel coin to try to infect Howie with the next hilarious disease. Pose of selfies, customize your game character, advance levels, inoculate Howie against other players. Just have fun - infecting.
summary:
Comedian, host, and producer, Howie Mandel, must be found. But first, you have to find the things that Howie loves. It's well-known that Howie is a germaphobe, so what will get you close to Howie? Find hazmat suits, gloves, hand sanitizer, and other Lures so you can help Howie Go Viral! 
 
Features 
* Augmented Reality 
* Pokemon Go style game with teleporting and auto-walking 
* Advanced Avatar Customization 
* Take selfies with Howie 
* Collect Lures to get Howie close enough to go viral and advance to the next level 
* In-app purchases
